thread.title: Braless Bella Hadid suffers EPIC wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Braless Bella Hadid suffers EPIC wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online

author: Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
title: Braless Bella Hadid suffers EPIC wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Out out: Bella has descended on the capital in true star style as she has joined a bevy of the Instagram generation of models - complete with Kendall Jenner (right) and Stella Maxwell (centre left) Leather lady: As the girls lived it up after a hard day of showcasing the hottest new couture, each stunner ensured she looked as fabulous as the next - with Bella indisputably making the biggest impact on the group due to her unfortunate mishap Legs eleven! Her leather mini dress looked sensational with the wrap detail drawing attention to her tiny waist while the raised hemline flashed a mass of leg She carried on with the theme with the addition of a black choker with a rocky cross hanging from the neck - perfect for adding a high fashion edge for the look for the party where the stars sipped cocktails made with Belvedere vodka, the brand sponsoring of the bash. With her sleek raven tresses worn in dead straight lengths, Bella nailed her Nineties goth look atop her dewy make-up and smudged eyeshadow. While her decision to go braless appeared a fantastic idea as she gave her famous glare into the camera from within the bash, later on the decision caused a mishap as she leaned forward and flashed her chest. Bella's sensational figure and stunning good looks would lead many to believe she is totally confident in herself, yet in a recent interview with Elle magazine the Victoria's Secret angel discussed her figure and body image. Cheeky! In the bash she showed off a mass of cleavage as she leaned forward and showed off her perky assets Choking up: She carried on with the theme with the addition of a black choker with a rocky cross hanging from the neck - perfect for adding a high fashion edge She said: 'I think every single person in the world has insecurities. It's crazy because I think that when other people look at all of the VS models or all of the girls (who) are walking, they're like: "They're not human. They don't have any insecurities" 'But I think every single girl (who's) going to be walking probably has an insecurity.' Of her means of staying in shape, she revealed: 'I think that if you just stick to something you can really achieve so much. 'I've been eating hard protein every day, and working out for three hours every day. It's crazy but I think that you know if you set your mind to something I think you can succeed.' Pals: Bella was joined by her pal Kendall as they larked around in the party Slick: Her gothic look wowed the party as she headed out with her model mates Read more: Share or comment on this article 88
